Hi Misty been a long time since we spoke.
=A0
I remember back early this ye=
ar when I first met Frank, and he too made the same comment as you, that yo=
u need not say anything.
=A0
I on the other hand could not accept this conc=
ept, but now after many of my crime case recordings, and reviewing all my q=
uestions asked, the voices told me what I needed to hear to get the right l=
eads. As soon as I turn that radio on ,they start talking about what happen=
ed, and even when i am asking them a question they are still talking. I hav=
e had to learn how to block out my questioning to hear what they said when =
I was talking.=A0
=A0
=A0I did try a recording without asking a question on=
ce, but just could not do it again as I have this in my head you need to as=
k questions.
=A0
Its hard to let go of, but you are right, they know what y=
ou need to hear.
=A0
Mike


=A0

--- On Sun, 9/21/08, Misty Dawn <bulletbab=
ea@...> wrote:

From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...>
Subject: RE:=
 [EVP-ITC] New messages posted
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Sunday, Se=
ptember 21, 2008, 1:33 PM






They have made mentions of it over the year=
s including a recent statement pertaining to the contact world which I just=
 posted over on my esnips from last session. They said when the contact wor=
ld first began it was very hard, and that access was terrible. Perhaps it i=
s easier with some of the newer methods researchers are using to maintain c=
ontact. Franks box has opened up a new avenue for those who had a hard time=
 hearing the traditional forms of evp. 

When I ask what the best method fo=
r contact is they always maintain its the method that no words are necessar=
y. Or as one stated recently (also posted on esnips in water files) "I can =
telepathic, you just can't hear good telepathic" "it will always be tenuous=
". This coming after a few restless nights of being woken up to loud voices=
 speaking to me or saying my name. Also a few things going on when I was wi=
de awake and fully alert. 

I have also had some info come thru on "station=
s" and even one recording where voices I know seemed to jump from one group=
 to another as I switched methods they could be heard introducing themselve=
s to those surrounding them stating why they were barging in there to commu=
nicate. I find it all of interest tho it tends to be alot to wrap ones mind=
 around.

Misty Dawn

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Hi Misty been a long time since we spoke.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I remember back early this year when I first met Frank, and he too made the same comment as you, that you need not say anything.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I on the other hand could not accept this concept, but now after many of my crime case recordings, and reviewing all my questions asked, the voices told me what I needed to hear to get the right leads. As soon as I turn that radio on ,they start talking about what happened, and even when i am asking them a question they are still talking. I have had to learn how to block out my questioning to hear what they said when I was talking. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> I did try a recording without asking a question once, but just could not do it again as I have this in my head you need to ask questions.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Its hard to let go of, but you are right, they know what you need to hear.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Mike<BR><BR></DIV>
<DIV> </DIV><BR><BR>--- On <B>Sun, 9/21/08, Misty Dawn <I><bulletbabea@...></I></B> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...><BR>Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New messages posted<BR>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Sunday, September 21, 2008, 1:33 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv622051339>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV>They have made mentions of it over the years including a recent statement pertaining to the contact world which I just posted over on my esnips from last session. They said when the contact world first began it was very hard, and that access was terrible. Perhaps it is easier with some of the newer methods researchers are using to maintain contact. Franks box has opened up a new avenue for those who had a hard time hearing the traditional forms of evp. <BR><BR>When I ask what the best method for contact is they always maintain its the method that no words are necessary. Or as one stated recently (also posted on esnips in water files) "I can telepathic, you just can't hear good telepathic" "it will always be tenuous". This coming after a few restless nights of being woken up to loud voices speaking to me or saying my name. Also a few things going on when I was wide awake and fully alert. <BR><BR>I have also had some info come thru on "stations" and
 even one recording where voices I know seemed to jump from one group to another as I switched methods they could be heard introducing themselves to those surrounding them stating why they were barging in there to communicate. I find it all of interest tho it tends to be alot to wrap ones mind around.<BR><BR>Misty Dawn<BR><BR>--- On Sun, 9/21/08, Ron Lederer <<A href="mailto:ronriko%40yahoo.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>ronriko@yahoo. com</A>> wrote:<BR><BR>> From: Ron Lederer <<A href="mailto:ronriko%40yahoo.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>ronriko@yahoo. com</A>><BR>> Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New messages posted<BR>> To: <A href="mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com</A><BR>> Date: Sunday, September 21, 2008, 1:13 PM<BR>> for Misty   Not a surprise here about ETs being<BR>> involved.  From day one I have been sort of tracking what<BR>> is reportedly said
 about "who is involved and who is in<BR>> charge" of communications on the others side.  I hope<BR>> more researchers ask the question so we can all compare<BR>> notes.   For example, one evper report there are 10,000<BR>> "communications stations" staffed on the other<BR>> side.  My question are; staffed by who or what, what is<BR>> their purpose, do they have regulations for what can be<BR>> said to this side, and many, many more questions.  Like it<BR>> has been said, if we knew all the answers this would not be<BR>> research.  Hope to hear more on this from you and others. <BR>> Thanks for that....ron<BR>> <BR>> --- On Sun, 9/21/08, Misty Dawn<BR>> <<A href="mailto:bulletbabea%40yahoo.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>bulletbabea@ yahoo.com</A>> wrote:<BR>> <BR>> From: Misty Dawn <<A href="mailto:bulletbabea%40yahoo.com" target=_blank
